title: Separating Modules Into Different Files
description: In this lab, you will learn how to separate modules into different files by extracting them into their own files and organizing them in a module tree structure.

meta.title: Separating Modules Into Different Files | Rust Programming
meta.description: Learn how to separate modules into different files and organize them in a module tree structure in Rust programming language.
meta.keywords: Rust, Modules, File Organization, Module Tree, Programming Tutorials
